meanings.definition: Of or relating to the sky.
meanings.sent1: The skiey clouds drifted lazily above us.
meanings.sent2: The airplane soared through the skiey expanse.
meanings.sent3: The skiey birds seemed to be playing tag with the clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a skiey gaze, full of dreams and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The skiey sunset painted the horizon in hues of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: Resembling the sky in color or quality.
meanings.sent1: The skiey blue dress matched her eyes perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the skiey hues of dawn in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The skiey cotton candy looked almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: His skiey voice was as soothing as a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The skiey reflection on the lake made it seem like a mirror to the heavens.
